thread.title: Lloyds bans cryptocurrency buying with credit card

title: Lloyds bans cryptocurrency buying with credit card
text:
Lloyds bans cryptocurrency buying with credit card 2:49pm GMT - 01:17 
Lloyds Banking Group has said it will ban its credit card customers from buying Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. As Ciara Lee reports, Britain's biggest mortgage lender fears that they could run up huge losses. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Lloyds Banking Group has said it will ban its credit card customers from buying Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. As Ciara Lee reports, Britain's biggest mortgage lender fears that they could run up huge losses.
